text: Gurbrü () is a municipality in the Bern-Mittelland in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. == History == Gurbrü is first mentioned in 1214 as Gurbru. In 1901, the Bern–Neuchâtel railway built a station in the municipality. == Demographics == Gurbrü has a population () of . ==References== Category:Municipalities in Bern-Mittelland
title: Gurbrü
